New Records: James Harden broke a tie with Ray Allen for the No. 2 spot on the NBA's 3-pointers list
Key Match Events: James Harden connected on the 2,974th 3-pointer of his career against the Utah Jazz
Pre-Game Insights: Clippers coach Tyronn Lue called Harden and Allen 'extraordinary shooters'
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden passed Ray Allen in 1,086 games to make 2,974 3-pointers
Miscellaneous Highlights: James Harden is one of three players in NBA history to have 300 3-pointers in a season
James Harden is 15th on the NBA's career list in points and 13th in assists
Others: Stephen Curry is the only player ahead of Harden on the list with 3,782 3-pointers
The Utah Jazz lost to the LA Clippers 116-105
